fw.name: PLMSecuritySSOCClient
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: PLMSSOClient
class.abstract: Role: This interface enables a CAA application running within VPM Navigator to retrieve credentials when an SSO Authentication has been already performed in VPM Navigator.

method.name: GetCredentialSetForApplication
method.abstract: Retrieve all credentials for a given instance of a given application.

method.name: IsAlreadyAuthenticated
method.abstract: Test if the there have been an SSO authentication already.

method.name: IsSSOActivated
method.abstract: Test if the SSO runtime has been turned on.

constructor.name: PLMSSOCredential
constructor.abstract: Construct an empty credential with a given name and value.

constructor.name: PLMSSOCredential
constructor.abstract: Construct a credential with a given name and value.

method.name: GetCredentialName
method.abstract: Retrieve the name of the credential.

method.name: GetCredentialValue
method.abstract: Retrieve the value of the credential.

method.name: operator=
method.abstract: Assignment operator from a PLMSSOCredential instance.

constructor.name: PLMSSOCredentialSet
constructor.abstract: The default constructor of a PLMSSOCredentialSet.

method.name: AddCredential
method.abstract: Add a PLMSSOCredential to this PLMSSOCredentialSet.

method.name: GetApplicationName
method.abstract: Retrieve the name of the application for which the PLMSSOCredentialSet has been defined for.

method.name: GetCredential
method.abstract: Gives a credential added earlier from its name.

method.name: RemoveCredential
method.abstract: Remove a PLMSSOCredential to this PLMSSOCredentialSet.

method.name: SetApplicationName
method.abstract: Sets the name of the application for which the PLMSSOCredentialSet has been defined for.

method.name: SetInstanceName
method.abstract: Sets the name of the instance of the application for which the PLMSSOCredentialSet has been defined for.

method.name: Size
method.abstract: Retrieve the number of credentials contained in the PLMSSOCredentialSet.

method.name: operator[]
method.abstract: Returns the PLMSSOCredential at the given iIndex.
